Business in Smallenske

Business in Smallenske

13.12.2023 18:30
TSB will help entrepreneurs build a business plan and select a company development strategy
WTB expanded the line of non-financial services on Business Platform WB. Entrepreneurs may use a business plan service based on 40 ready models, as well as marketing studies on their markets. Services are available...
13.12.2023 17:45
TSB Online is recognized as the best mobile bank in 2023 by the Go Banking Awards rating
Online WTB became the best mobile application in the Go Banking Awards 2023 rating. In particular, the service received the highest ratings in the " Marketing Annexes " and " Promotion in digital " awards.

12.12.2023 16:55
TB Online users can record voice messages in chat rooms

WTB launched a new version of the Online chat, a recording of voice messages with automatic translation of the voice into a text format. This will make the dialogue with chat-bot and operator easier and faster, in particular for VTB clients with disabilities. Opium is available...

12.12.2023 15.15
In a new year, with a new Tele2 route: the operator expanded the routes for ecotourism in the Smolen region
Smolensk, Tele2, Russian mobile operator, continues to offer unusual recreational places for those who have seen. Now, on-line resources, travel guides are available in winter tourist locations and entertainment, and the residents and guests of the Smole region can...
11.12.2023 12:49
" Roadbis " is the winner of the regional phase of the federal competition " Russian Organization for High Social Efficiency "
In the Government of the Smole region, a solemn award ceremony was held following the provincial labour-protection surveys and the regional phase of the entire Russian competition " Russian Organization for High Social Efficiency " .


8.12.2023 14:24
TSB has transferred large clients to TBT Business-Online

TSB has completed the migration of clients to a new remote banking system for the large business of TBT Business-Online. This was reported by the head of the Department of Transaction ...

08.12.2023 10:10
Tele2 clients can get a second ticket to the GUM roll.
Tele2 proposes to dwell in the anticipational atmosphere and to visit the GUM-cat. In the winter season, 2023-2024, the operator becomes a partner of the roller and, when buying an online ticket, offers a second gift to clients.
07.12.2023 13:50
Tele2 extinguishes mobile Internet: speed increased by 25%

Tele2, based on the analysis and wishes of its clients, refarms across Smallenska have been conducted, making the mobile Internet work much faster. In simple words, this process improves the speed of the Internet...

07.12.2023 13:12
WTB starts selling its retail products at the offices of the Open Bank

Since January 2024, WTB will start offering its retail financial products in the open offices. First of the product line, banks will have access to deposits, savings accounts and mortgage loans. Integrating Open WTB will...

07.12.2023 12:19
TSB will increase the office network by 40%

WTB plans to expand the scope and accessibility of banking services to retail clients. To this end, on the horizon of three years, the bank will expand by 40 per cent of the office network, enter new areas, and expand the couriers (also in the next...

05.12.2023 12:47
Online Web site audit will grow by 1 million before the end of the year
The number of TB Online users per year will grow by 15 per cent and exceed 17 million. An increasing number of clients are starting to use the web site, increasing by 19 per cent in the year, to 6.5 million, of which a million are downloading the application in December. He told me about it...
29.11.2023 19:02
Young slaughterers can receive business development grants
An increasing number of representatives of the regional microbusiness community are joining the Maloy and Middle Entrepreneurship Project, noting the Governor of the Smole region, Vasili Anohin.
28.11.2023 13:07
What is the RCO for business? RCO Driver for Molenian Entrepreneurs
To date, Smolenian entrepreneurs have access to various business support measures. Among them, free search for Standart vacancies on HH.ru, launch of sales on one of the two largest Russian markers, OZON, various subsidies...
27.11.2023 11:33
TSB will increase the return on the savings account for card transactions
The TSB has launched a new storage account in rubles that can be managed independently. The pink customers will receive the daily balance of 15 per cent of the year in the first three months, and then they will be able to earn an elevated income and pay for the goods and services of the cards...
23.11.2023 17:06
Each eighth TSB technology office operates within the TFO area

As part of the extensive upgrade of the WTB network, the number of offices of a new technology format exceeded 100 sales points. In the Central Federal District, to date, clients are serving 14 new offices of different formats. Four of them to...

21.11.2023 11:53
Tele2 clients can buy Xiaomi and Infinix smartphones with a 55% discount on Black Friday
Tele2 launches a profitable proposal for the Black Friday. Clients can buy popular and qualitative Xiaomi and Infinix smartphones less than half-cent in the insurance kit and three months of communication. Brenda Infinix and Xiaomi are most demanded in the pink...
15.11.2023 14:09
TSB is beginning to issue credits for certified cars with runs

WTB became a partner of the Pango Cars Federal Automobile Ecosystem, including the sale of certified cars with a run. Clients buying light vehicles from the platform ' s range can lend a discount to 0.9 ppm from ...

14.11.2023 12:28
TSB launched two new options for international business

WCO has launched two additional options for new middle- and small-scale external business customers to the WED.Waluta and WED.Rubley service packages. These are complex solutions for calculations in rubles and national currencies ...

13.11.2023 16:50
The advisory board of shareholders of the TBT discussed the results of the work and further development of the bank in the SMB segment

The key results and strategies of the WTB in the SMB segment, as well as the development of products and services for entrepreneurs, were presented at a regular meeting of the Advisory Board of shareholders of the WTB (CSA) by the Deputy President of the Board of the Bank...

13.11.2023 13:28
Who can write off debts and credits from 3 November 2023?

Russian citizens will be able to dispose of credit and other debts under the new bankruptcy procedure. It is now much easier to do by amending the Bankruptcy Act.
